item.title: Bollards, 15th December
item.description:

Residents in Fox Hill need a solution this keeps happening it is not good for our tiny road massive trucks squeezing down it driving onto pavement very dangerous Reference - 5183144 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 13/12/2025 20:58 Bollards removed by heavy duty trucks I have put the bollards back but locks are broken. item.title: Area used as dumping ground., 15th December
item.description:
Yet again people persist in dumping anything they feel like outside Bermondsey Arts Club, 102A Tower Bridge Road SE1 4TP. Today there is a chest of drawers, duvet and two suitcases along with a lot of additional rubbish. In fact as I was taking these photos I challenged a lady who attempted to leave a large bin bag full of bottles. She explained that her boyfriend told her to leave it there. I encouraged her to take it elsewhere as this is not a public bin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grange Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped and in street, 15th December

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Durham Rise, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No working street light at Godfrey Hill end of Eleanor Walk, 15th December
item.description:
Street light has been out of order for at least a month. It's a narrow path that now needs a torch for people to access their homes. It does not feel safe turning into a dark corner.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richard Close, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet
